extensionAdditionalInfo.info: This extension contains a unit test action for running NUnit unit tests.

actionInfo.name: Execute NUnit Tests
actionInfo.summary: Runs NUnit unit tests on a specified project, assembly, or NUnit file.

extensionAdditionalInfo.actionInfo:
Action Fields

NUnit Executable Path

The path to (and including) nunit-console.exe.

.NET Framework Version

The version of .NET which will host the unit test runner.

Test File

The path relative to the source directory of the DLL, project file, or NUnit file to test against.

Group Name

The group name allows you to easily identify the unit test if you would like to split tests into different groups.
